summary: The Fertile Crescent is a curved area in the Middle East, covering parts of many countries like Iraq, Syria, and Egypt. It got its name because it was perfect for growing crops due to its rich soil and water sources. People here were among the first to start farming and domesticate plants. This led to the rise of ancient civilizations like Sumer. They also made important discoveries like writing, the wheel, and glass, which changed the world.
title: Fertile Crescent
